website_summaries.verdict: Made with premium ingredients and loaded with essential vitamins and minerals, Mazuri is easily the best tortoise food you can buy to support the longevity of your shelled friend.
pros: Timothy hay, soybean hulls, dried beet pulp, oat hulls, and wheat are the first 5 ingredients
cons: A relatively expensive pellet formula, but it receives high marks from zoos and veterinarians

customer_reviews.title: My redfoot tortoise loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this to supplement his fresh diet ever since he was a hatchling, and he goes wild for the stuff. You can see him in the pics on the first day I got him and his one year birthday. :) His shell is beautiful, and even still I have to be careful feeding it to him otherwise he'll ONLY want his mazuri.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our Greek Russian tortoise not interested
customer_reviews.text: Our tortoise will not eat this. It's very hard and if you moisten it, it literally stinks up the whole room with a strong grass like smell. It could be she's being picky. If this changes, I'll change review but for now we are disappointed as she does not want it at all, even after three to four days trying to serve it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky gal

customer_reviews.title: One of them seems to like it a bit more than the other
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a backup food when I run out of greens etc for my two red foots. It's okay. My tortoises arn't really all that crazy about it, but they'll eat it. One of them seems to like it a bit more than the other. Overall I guess it's a good backup food. I don't use it that often so the 12 oz package should last awhile. I soak the pellets in water for awhile to soften them before offering them to my tortoises.
customer_reviews.author: MDTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for a varied diet
customer_reviews.text: Got to add in to my box turtle's diet. She gets a couple of these pellets once a week for added variety and seems to like them best once soaked in water. I've put them in a food processor and made it like grub pie before too and she likes it that way a lot. My bearded dragons have snacked on a few as well.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Gray

customer_reviews.title: My Russian tortoise is completely obsessed with these pellets. ...
customer_reviews.text: My Russian tortoise is completely obsessed with these pellets. He even turned down tomatoes in favor of these! His shell looks bright and smooth after 2 years on these pellets so I really can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Talkahuano

customer_reviews.title: Loved by a red foot
customer_reviews.text: Very nutritious for my red foot tortoise and eastern box turtle! I have been transitioning their diet so that this will make up about 80% of their diet. The red foot LOVES it but I'm still working on the box turtle. I do soak the pellets a little bit. Box turtles are pretty picky anyways though. The other 20% of their diet consists of 15% leafy greens and 5% fruits and other vegetables. I grow their food in my garden, so this will keep my garden supply steady and help me spend less money on their food during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: elime

customer_reviews.title: No One Would Eat It
customer_reviews.text: Mazuri used to be a big hit with my leopards , both adult and hatchling. The new formula was rejected by all. Tried it moistened, dry, mixed with greens and it was a no go. Today I just dumped it in the compost bin.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Good product,  good value.
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting to try Mazuri pellets for my desert tortoises, but didn't want 25# bag, so this was perfect. Thrilled that they like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dian C. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great tortoise food!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant when mazuri changed their formula and look of their product but my red foot tortoise still gobbled these up. Mazuri is known for their high quality and good nutrition for tortoises.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My red foot tortoises like this. It’s recommended by my vet, a tortoise sanctuary and the breeder.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Smells good enough for me to eat!!
customer_reviews.text: My tortoises love this stuff and I’ve been tempted to try it too lol. I have to watch my dog because he’ll steal it from the tortoises when I’m not looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My  red foot tortoise love these
customer_reviews.text: My red foot tortoise love these. I pre soak them and add greens. It's a great addition to their diet and has everything they need in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My sulcata loves this food! And ita very good for them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great food.
customer_reviews.text: My red foots love it. We alternate this with red foot appropriate veggies and also recommend buying Rep Cal tortoise food.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty J.

customer_reviews.title: Frank loves his new food :D
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of these pellets. Our tort is still pretty small and these are much easier for him to grab a hold of compared to the huge pellets we've gotten in the past!!
customer_reviews.author: Special_Kitty_88

customer_reviews.title: My Cayman Blue Iguana loves this food.  It's like crack for him.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my iguana loves it. I wouldn't use it as a daily food source but it works great when I find the store is out of greens, or as a treat to mix things up. I soak it in water for about 15 min to soften it up first.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise uninterested
customer_reviews.text: Our tortoise is used to fresh food and would not touch this feed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Berg

customer_reviews.title: Sulcata loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My sulcata loves this pellet. He's 1 yr, and will now eat the pellets wet or dry. I often have to refill his plate twice a day and he will come running to eat more.
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: My tortoise loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My tortoise loves this food. This was my first time ordering it from Amazon. Price was cheaper than pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A Leonard

customer_reviews.title: and was recommended by my vet
customer_reviews.text: This is healthy for my tortoise, and was recommended by my vet. He seems to really love it!
customer_reviews.author: La-dee-da

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy liked it enough to take it from the little ones
customer_reviews.text: Fluffy quite liked the grandchildren can hand feet it to her
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like butt when I got them and my tortoise wouldn't eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My red foots love this they are older guys so I need bigger bags of it
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If its good enough for the zoo, then its good enough of me:)
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Good size package
customer_reviews.text: Great package size vs. the bucket. Wanted to see if tortoise would eat before purchasing a large amount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy tort
customer_reviews.text: My Sonoran desert tortoise loves it. Can hear them hit the ground and comes out to eat them
customer_reviews.author: Stephen fox

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Tortoises are getting use to them. I use them as a supplement
customer_reviews.author: Gail F.

customer_reviews.title: I think I can say with certainty that MOST tortoises won't touch this...
customer_reviews.text: My tortoiseS just looked at it! I don't know if it's the smell or what but they wouldn't even touch the greens after I removed the offensive stuff. I asked around on tortoiseforum.com and evidently MOST tortoises won't touch the stuff even softened. And it doesn't look like the stuff on the picture. It's pellets. Not nuggets. I tried to get them to fix that but alas no...
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my sulcatas love this stuff! I spray it with water to soften it up and mix it into their daily greens!
customer_reviews.author: Cristal Posada

customer_reviews.title: Sulcata approved
customer_reviews.text: My young Sulcata loves this stuff. Ate it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly

customer_reviews.title: I don't love it, but my 8 year old marginated does
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't love it, but my 8 year old marginated does..
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: The only thing she will eat
customer_reviews.text: My girl won't eat anything else. She refuses other commercial diets and would rather go on a hunger strike lol
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect amount for my juvenile sulcata. It came quickly and was exactly as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Patterson

customer_reviews.title: ... expected I have a sulcata tortiose and she didn't like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected I have a sulcata tortiose and she didn't like this stuff, not to mention it's higher in protein than fiber which should be opposite. I'll stick to grassland tortoise food!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Marie Salnardi

customer_reviews.title: My red foot does not like this food
customer_reviews.text: My red foot does not like this food, idk if if it is because she is so young but she defiantly won't touch it, even when I soak it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My tortoise refuses to eat it unless I mix it with veggies chopped up finely.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina i

customer_reviews.title: Very, very pleased with product and speed of arrival, but a better description of the product will help sell it better.
customer_reviews.text: A rare product to find in a small size, which is great for sampling, or small tortoises. The LS diet form of Mazuri's first ingredient is Timothy hay which I prefer over the regular Mazuri tortoise diet. The items name and description does not say "LS diet," but I went by the picture and kept my fingers crossed and got exactly what I wanted and in a speedy amount of time. Maybe they can include in the items name LS diet to help sell it better.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F.

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit hesitant on buying this as I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant on buying this as I have heard many tortoises don't touch the stuff, but wanted to give the LS diet a try since the regular formula is a big hit with my Red Footed. I bought this small back just in case she didn't take to it, but my tortoise ended up loving this as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sdg

customer_reviews.title: Way over priced for tortoise food
customer_reviews.text: Expensive! Better to spend the money on fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Music2000

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise love it
customer_reviews.text: If course I don’t know what it tastes like but my Red Footed tortoise love it.
customer_reviews.author: erica ralston

product_meta.title: Mazuri Tortoise Diet
product_meta.description: Size:12 OZMazuri Tortoise Diet is a low-starch, high-fiber tortoise food for dry land herbivorous tortoises such as gopher, sulcata and Galapagos tortoises. This tortoise food offers complete nutrition in pellet form and contains yucca to help reduce ammonia odors.
feature_bullets: Complete nutrition for tortoises - No vitamin or mineral supplementation needed
High fiber level and low starch - Grass hay based diet
Contains natural vitamin E and natural antioxidants
Contains live probiotics cultures, which may enhance development of GI tract

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
